span.p:
First phase features:
- Basic 2-hit combos
- Defensive options
- Predictable movements
- One special attack

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Second phase adds:
- Faster attacks
- Power attack combos
- AOE attacks
- Heal attempt when low
